verses.text: PEA fai tau ‘a e kau Filisitia ki ‘Isileli, pea hola ‘a e kau tangata ‘Isileli mei he ‘ao ‘o e kau Filisitia, pea na‘e ai ha tō ‘i Mo‘unga Kilipoa.
Pea tata‘o mai ‘a e kau Filisitia, ‘o nau tuli kia Saula mo hono ngaahi foha, ‘o nau taa‘i ‘a Sonatane, mo ‘Apinatape, mo Malikisua, ko e ngaahi foha ‘o Saula.
Pea na‘e mamafa ‘a e tau kia Saula, pea na‘e ma‘u ia ‘e he kakai fana ngahau, pea na‘a ne mamahi lahi ‘i he a‘u ‘a e kau fana.

Pea pehē ‘e Saula ki he‘ene fua mahafu, Unuhi ho‘o heletā, ‘o tui ‘aki au; na‘a a‘u mai ‘a e kau ta‘ekamu na, ‘o tui‘i au, ‘o nau fakatakataka ‘aki au. Ka na‘e ‘ikai fie fai ‘e he‘ene fua mahafu, ko ‘ene manavahē lahi; ko ia, na‘e to‘o ‘e Saula ‘ene heletā ‘a‘ana, ‘o ne fakahinga ki ai.
Pea ‘i he vakai ‘e he‘ene fua mahafu kuo pekia ‘a Saula, na‘a ne fakahinga mo ia ki he‘ene heletā, ‘o na mate fakataha.
Ko ia, na‘e pekia ‘a Saula, mo hono foha ‘e toko tolu, mo ‘ene fua mahafu, pea mo ‘ene kau tangata kotoa pē ‘i he ‘aho ko ia fakataha.

Pea ko e kau tangata ‘Isileli na‘e ‘i he potu ‘e taha ‘o e lautoka, mo kinautolu na‘e ‘i he potu mai ‘o Soatani, ‘i he‘enau vakai ‘oku hola ‘a e kau tangata ‘Isileli, pea kuo pekia ‘a Saula mo hono ngaahi foha, na‘a nau li‘aki ‘a e ngaahi kolo ko ē ‘o nau hola: pea ha‘u ‘a e kau Filisitia, ‘o nofo ai.
Pea ‘i he ha‘u ‘a e kau Filisitia pongipongi ke vete ‘a e pekia, na‘a nau ‘ilo ‘a Saula mo hono foha ‘e toko tolu ‘oku nau fetākoto‘i ‘i Mo‘unga Kilipoa.
Pea nau tu‘usi hono ‘ulu, mo vete ‘ene mahafu, ‘o nau ‘ave holo ‘i he fonua ‘o e kau Filisitia, ke ongoongo ‘a e me‘a ki honau fale ‘aitoli mo e kakai.
Pea nau tuku ‘ene mahafu ki he fale ‘o ‘Asiteloti: ka ko hono ‘anga‘anga na‘a nau fakama‘u fakau‘u ki he ‘ā ‘o Petesani.
Pea ‘i he fanongo ki ai ‘e he nofo Siepesikiliati, ki he me‘a kuo fai ‘e he kakai Filisitia kia Saula,
pea tutu‘u ‘a e kau to‘a kotoa pē, pea nau to‘o ‘a e ‘anga‘anga ‘o Saula, mo e ngaahi ‘anga‘anga ‘o ‘ene fānau, mei he ‘ā ‘o Petesani; pea nau ha‘u mo kinautolu ki Siepesi, ‘o tanu ai.
Pea nau to‘o honau ngaahi hui, ‘o tanu ‘i he lolo tamalisi ‘oku ‘i Siepesi, ‘o nau ‘aukai ‘o ‘aho fitu.
